nodes.text: Colonel Jadick was a Human male officer of the Imperial Reclamation Service serving the reconstituted Sith Empire during the time of the Galactic War. Stationed above the Harrower-class dreadnought Ziost Shadow, he received the Gree Enclave's Administrator General Lalat'k who told Jadick about the Hypergate crisis on Asation. Through the droid AD-304, Jadick invited Imperial heroes to meet Lalat'k, so that they could assist with the operation on Asation.
